tool_description: Retrieves detailed technical specifications and features for specific bathroom fixture products.

product_ids.description: List of product IDs to extract specifications for

include_technical.description: Include technical specifications like water flow rates

error_messages: Invalid product ID: One or more product IDs are not recognized in the database
Too many products: Maximum 20 products can be processed at once
Product specification unavailable: Some products may have incomplete specification data
usage: Provide an array of product_ids obtained from search results. Optionally control which specification categories to include.

specifications.description: Array of detailed specification strings for each product

dimensions.description: Array of dimension strings (length x width x height) for each product

materials.description: Array of material and finish descriptions for each product

technical_specs.description: Array of technical specification summaries for each product
